ygData.subject: Re: NullPointerException in Extractor
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not using a mid-fetch filter, but rather Tom s URI regex exclude- filter in the scope.  Now that I think about it, this problem started happening around

I'm not using a mid-fetch filter, but rather Tom's URI regex exclude-
filter in the scope.  Now that I think about it, this problem 
started happening around the time I added this filter.

> I'm running a crawl with HEAD w/ the last few hours and haven't 
seen the 
> NPEs using default config.
> 
> Are you using midfetch filters?  It might be that these lines, 
> 
http://crawler.archive.org/xref/org/archive/crawler/fetcher/FetchHTTP
.html#365, 
> should be moved up to line 312?
> 
> Send me your order file and seeds if you can and I'll try your 
crawl 
> from here.
> 
>
